18#ifndef _LVM_DISPLAY_H
19#define _LVM_DISPLAY_H
20
21#include "metadata-exported.h"
22#include "locking.h"
23
24#include <stdint.h>
25
26uint64_t units_to_bytes(const char *units, char *unit_type);
27
28/* Specify size in KB */
29const char *display_size(const struct cmd_context *cmd, uint64_t size);
30const char *display_size_long(const struct cmd_context *cmd, uint64_t size);
31const char *display_size_units(const struct cmd_context *cmd, uint64_t size);
32
33char *display_uuid(char *uuidstr);
34void display_stripe(const struct lv_segment *seg, uint32_t s, const char *pre);
35
36void pvdisplay_colons(const struct physical_volume *pv);
37void pvdisplay_segments(const struct physical_volume *pv);
38void pvdisplay_full(const struct cmd_context *cmd,
39 const struct physical_volume *pv,
40 void *handle);
41int pvdisplay_short(const struct cmd_context *cmd,
42 const struct volume_group *vg,
43 const struct physical_volume *pv, void *handle);
44
45void lvdisplay_colons(const struct logical_volume *lv);
46int lvdisplay_segments(const struct logical_volume *lv);
47int lvdisplay_full(struct cmd_context *cmd, const struct logical_volume *lv,
48 void *handle);
49
50void vgdisplay_extents(const struct volume_group *vg);
51void vgdisplay_full(const struct volume_group *vg);
52void vgdisplay_colons(const struct volume_group *vg);
53void vgdisplay_short(const struct volume_group *vg);
54
55void display_formats(const struct cmd_context *cmd);
56void display_segtypes(const struct cmd_context *cmd);
57
58/*
59 * Allocation policy display conversion routines.
60 */
61const char *get_alloc_string(alloc_policy_t alloc);
62alloc_policy_t get_alloc_from_string(const char *str);
63
64char yes_no_prompt(const char *prompt, ...);
65
66#endif
67
